name: Cursed Souls (in development)
description:
Cursed Souls its a free Souls-Like game heavily inspired by Dark Souls that you are The Souls Gatherer, a man seeking for answers and has been choosen to break a curse casted to the forsaken land! 

Remember, its a simple, short and not completed game made by an amateur brazilian indie game developer, i still have a lot to learn and this game will have updates, so expect more content, new mechanics and systems, sound effects, bug fixes and more to come!
